EmailTemplate.name: IB confirmation CURRENT STUDENTS
EmailTemplate.subject: IB Information Evening, Tuesday 13 June
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
It's most exciting that your child is considering the IB!
Just to confirm your booking for the IB Open Evening on Tuesday 13 June at 5.30pm.
Please go straight to the MC Newth Auditorium, on the Ground Floor of the BBC.
The evening commences at 5.30pm with a welcome from Dr Collier, followed by a presentation from our Director or Learning, Mrs Sharon Munro and past and current IB students. There will also be guest speakers on the evening.
We anticipate the presentations will conclude by 7.00pm.
Can you please confirm the following:
1. Number of people attending; {!Lead.No_of_People_Attending__c}
2. Names of people attending; {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} {!Lead.Other_Tour_Attendee_Name__c}
3. Is there anything specific you would like covered in the presentations?
We look forward to seeing you on the evening!
Kindest regards
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Administrative Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia direct +61 2 9286 9552 email rpedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
